title: Five-Star Bulgaria Escape Overlooking Sofia's Narodno Sabranie Square
description: Find yourself immersed in modern luxury at the five-star InterContinental Sofia, an IHG Hotel, which overlooks the Bulgarian capital's iconic Narodno Sabranie Square and offers stunning views of St Alexander Nevsky Cathedral. Venture down 'Yellow Cobbles' to experience iconic landmarks, then round back to Vitosha Boulevard for your hit of retail and fine dining. On your return, book a visit to the onsite day spa and a table at the hotel's sophisticated Floret Restaurant and Bar.
